All Classes

Class Description
BackroundTrees
BackroundTrees is the backround of the game.
BuyCycle  
BuyMenu  
Clock
This class is used to perform periodic actions.
DistanceMarker  
Driver  
EndSlide
This class represents the endSlide that is the first thing that the user will see once the game is booted There is one button: Exit - Exits the game
EventPopup
This class represents the timer pop-up that happens randomly during the game.
FamilyMenu
Family menu class.
Farmer  
FieldClock
This clock class implements a Singleton design pattern.
Fields
Class for fields used in this game.
Game
Class which represents the Game.
HowToPlayScreen
This class represents the How To Play section of the main menu This screen has one button to go back to the main menu
InitialCutscene  
Loader
Abstract class used for file manipulation.
MainMenu
This class represents the main menu that is the first thing that the user will see once the game is booted There are three buttons : Start game - Starts the game How To Play - A section describing the rule and controls of the game Exit - Exits the game
PassportBuy  
ResourceMenu
Class representing the resource menu in the top left of the screen.
Scoreboard
This class represents the endSlide that is the first thing that the user will see once the game is booted There is one button: Exit - Exits the game
Shop  
SoundEffect
The Options Listed For Playing Each Option Contains The URL path and the file name for user to choose to play
SoundEffect.Volume
